original_text: And he said, “Why does my lord pursue after his servant? For what have I done? What evil is on my hands?
korean_text: 또 이르되 내 주는 어찌하여 주의 종을 쫓으시나이까 내가 무엇을 하였으며 내 손에 무슨 악이 있나이까

sentences.original_text: Why does my lord pursue after his servant?
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 주께서 어찌하여 당신의 종을 쫓으시나이까?

sentences.original_text: What evil is on my hands?
